snippet: Officials of the eurozone's central bank meet in Frankfurt tomorrow in the latest effort to salvage the single currency. But will Germany go along with a pledge by the bank's president to "do whatever it takes"?
abstract: Officials of the eurozone's central bank meet in Frankfurt tomorrow in the latest effort to salvage the single currency. But will Germany go along with a pledge by the bank's president to "do whatever it takes"?

headline.main: Crunch Time for the Euro -- Again
